notes.player:
On Rapport(Charm)/Presence(Leadership) with imperials: spend FP to gain Advantage

You have spent time studying the holy writings of the Cult Imperialis and can invoke hallowed passages to sway others. You may spend a Fate Point to gain Advantage when making a Rapport (Charm) or Presence (Leadership) Test when interacting with an Imperial.

requirement.value: Faithful (Imperial Cult) Talent, 1 Advance in Lore(Theology)
requirement.script: return (this.actor.itemTypes["specialisation"].find(i => i.name == "Theology" && i.system.skill == "lore")?.system?.advances >= 1) && this.actor.itemTypes["talent"].find(i => i.name == "Faithful(Imperial Cult)")
